GPT-4o Tools API¶

Utilities under the gpt4o package support evaluating GPT-4o recommendation slates and interacting with the model provider. The modules below expose the main entry points for running evaluations, preparing conversations, and rendering leaderboard titles.

Utilities for evaluating GPT-4o slate baselines.

Command-line interface for the GPT-4o slate baseline.

gpt4o.cli.build_parser()[source]¶

Create the CLI argument parser for the GPT-4o baseline.

Return type:

ArgumentParser

gpt4o.cli.main(argv=None)[source]¶

Parse command-line arguments and execute the evaluation routine.

Parameters:

argv (list[str] | None)

Return type:

None

Azure OpenAI client helpers for GPT-4o evaluation.

gpt4o.client.ds_call(messages, max_tokens, temperature, deployment=None)[source]¶

Execute a chat completion call and return the trimmed text output.

Parameters:

  • messages (List[Dict[str, str]])

  • max_tokens (int)

  • temperature (float)

  • deployment (str | None)

Return type:

str

gpt4o.client.get_client()[source]¶

Construct or reuse the singleton Azure OpenAI client.

Return type:

openai.AzureOpenAI

Shared configuration for the GPT-4o slate baseline.

gpt4o.config.ensure_azure_env()[source]¶

Ensure the Azure environment variables are present.

The sandbox runner historically relied on these being set globally. We keep the behaviour but allow shell overrides to win.

Return type:

None

Prompt construction and example formatting for GPT-4o evaluation.

Utilities for resolving slate video ids to human-readable titles.
